name: Night Realm's Gift: Crests and Troughs
description:
When Mualani, who has this card equipped, switches to be the "Active Character": Trigger the "End Phase" effect of a random "Summon" on your side. (Once per Round)
(You must have Mualani in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When $[A1214], who has this card equipped, switches to be the "Active Character":</color> Trigger the "End Phase" effect of a random "Summon" on your side. (Once per Round)\n(You must have $[A1214] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When Mualani, who has this card equipped, switches to be the "Active Character":</color> Trigger the "End Phase" effect of a random "Summon" on your side. (Once per Round)\n(You must have Mualani in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
source: Reward for inviting Mualani to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
